text.itemswapper.controllerSpeed.tooltip: How fast the controller moves the cursor inside the UI.
text.itemswapper.mouseSpeed.tooltip: How fast the mouse moves the cursor inside the UI.
text.itemswapper.title: Item Swapper
text.itemswapper.toggleMode.tooltip: When enabled, the UI will stay open until you press the key again or do the left click.
text.itemswapper.showCursor.tooltip: Show a cursor inside the UI.
text.itemswapper.disabled: The mod is disabled by the server!
text.itemswapper.editMode.tooltip: Helper mode for creating your own resource pack. Shows the items in a chest as a preview in the inventory, with a button to copy the preview to your clipboard.
text.itemswapper.ignoreHotbar.tooltip: Don't show items from the hotbar in lists.
text.itemswapper.creativeCheatMode.toolt: Have access to all items in the UI while in creative mode.
text.itemswapper.confirm.title: Enable mod on this server?
text.itemswapper.confirm.description: The server has this mod neither installed nor blocked. Do you want to enable the mod without shulker box support? Please ask the server owner/team for permission first. Using this mod on a server without permission might get you banned!
text.itemswapper.resourcepack.notSelecte: Warning! No compatible resource pack for ItemSwapper is enabled!
text.itemswapper.unlockListMouse.tooltip: Allows you to still move the mouse while having a list open. Only the mouse wheel will interact with the list.
Copy preview as JSON to Clipboard
Successfully copied preview to your clipboard. - Check the clipboard of your operating system, as an alternative check out your current log file.
text.itemswapper.disabledByPlayer: You have disabled the mod for this server!
text.itemswapper.disableShulkers.tooltip: Shulkerboxes can not be opened inside the inventory. No items will be pulled out of them.
text.itemswapper.fallbackInventory.toolt: Open the inventory instead of doing nothing, when the current item has nothing assigned to it.
text.itemswapper.showTooltips.tooltip: Show tooltips with explanations for the buttons in the UI.
text.itemswapper.clearSlot.tooltip: Move the current item in hand to a free slot in the inventory or a container.
text.itemswapper.back.tooltip: Navigate back to the previous palette.
text.itemswapper.openInventory.tooltip: Open the inventory to access items and containers.
text.itemswapper.lastItem.tooltip: This is the last item you swapped to. Select it to grab it again. Clicking it will open the palette that contained it.
text.itemswapper.restockAll.tooltip: Fill up item stacks in the inventory using items from containers.
text.itemswapper.usedwhitelist: Used the whitelist to enable the mod. It's still not supported by the server!
text.itemswapper.vivecraftCompat.tooltip:
Use direct input for cursor movement.
Mouse speed will be ignored, toggle mode is forced to on.
text.itemswapper.allowWalkingWithUI.tool: Allows you to walk around while the UI is open. Turning this off makes the mod more vanilla-like.
text.itemswapper.startOnItem.tooltip: When opening the UI, the cursor will be on the currently held item.
text.itemswapper.disablePickblockOnTools: While holding a tool or weapon: Enable - Pick block will work as usual(Inventory and Shulkerboxes). Disable - Pick block will be disabled. Vanilla behavior - Pick block will work as in vanilla(only Inventory).
text.itemswapper.openPalette.tooltip: Open a color palette to find blocks with the same color.
text.itemswapper.autoPalette.tooltip: Automatically creates palettes for blocks with the same color.
text.itemswapper.alwaysInventory.tooltip: Always open the inventory when the UI is opened, not a palette.
text.itemswapper.showHotbar.tooltip: Show the hotbar in the Inventory UI.
text.itemswapper.rememberPalette.tooltip: Remember the last palette you used for each item and open it again when you open the UI with that item.
text.itemswapper.showOpenInventoryButton: Show or hide the open inventory button in the UI.
text.itemswapper.doubleTapQuickSwap.tool: Enable or disable double tap to quick swap to the last used item
